summary: Rachel is a lonely school teacher who lives with her mother. When a man from the big city asks her out, she starts thinking about where she wants her life to go.
cast: Joanne Woodward|James Olson|Kate Harrington|Estelle Parsons|Donald Moffat|Terry Kiser|Frank Corsaro|Bernard Barrow|Geraldine Fitzgerald|Nell Potts|Shawn Campbell|Violet Dunn|Beatrice Pons|Dortha Duckworth|Simm Landres|Izzy Singer|Tod Engle|Connie Robinson|Sylvia Shipman|Larry Fredericks|Bruno Engler|Wendell P. MacNeal IV|Pete Bostrom
keywords: lesbian subtext|sexual initiation|friendship between women|domineering mother|teacher
title: Rachel, Rachel
